ã€Šç‰©ç†å…‰å­¦ã€‹è¯¾ç¨‹å­¦æœŸæœŸé—´å­¦ä¹ ç¬”è®°â€”â€”å…‰çš„è¡å°„éƒ¨åˆ†

ä¸€ã€å®šä¹‰

1.è¡å°„ æ³¢åœ¨ä¼ æ’­è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­é‡åˆ°éšœç¢ç‰©åç¦»å‡ ä½•è·¯å¾„ä¼ æ’­ï¼ˆè¿›å…¥å‡ ä½•é˜´å½±åŒºï¼‰çš„ç°è±¡ã€‚$\rightarrow$ å’Œå¹²æ¶‰åŒæ—¶å­˜åœ¨ $\rightarrow$ æ˜¯==ä¸€åˆ‡æ³¢åŠ¨==å›ºæœ‰çš„ç‰¹æ€§

2.è¡å°„å±å’Œå±å‡½æ•°ï¼š $\tilde{E_i} \ \rightarrow \ è¡å°„å±\ \rightarrow \ \tilde{E_t}$

3.å¤æŒ¯å¹…é€å°„å‡½æ•°: $\tilde{t}(x,y)=\frac{\tilde{E_t}(x,y)}{\tilde{E_i}(x,y)} \rightarrow ç³å‡½æ•°$

äºŒã€è¡å°„ä¸‰è¦ç´ 

  1. å…‰æºå‘å‡ºçš„å…‰æ³¢
  2. è¡å°„ç‰©
  3. è¡å°„å›¾å½¢

ä¸‰ã€è²æ¶…å°”è¡å°„å’Œå¤«ç…ç¦¾è´¹è¡å°„

  • è²æ¶…å°”è¡å°„$\rightarrow$ å…‰æºå’Œæ¥æ”¶å±åœ¨æœ‰é™è¿œå¤„ï¼Œæ»¡è¶³å‚è½´è¿‘ä¼¼

  • å¤«ç…ç¦¾è´¹è¡å°„$\rightarrow$ å…‰æºå’Œæ¥æ”¶å±åœ¨æ— é™è¿œå¤„ï¼Œæ»¡è¶³è¿œåœºè¿‘ä¼¼

æƒ æ›´æ–¯-è²æ¶…å°”åŸç†

å«ä¹‰ï¼š æ³¢å‰ä¸Šçš„æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªé¢å…ƒéƒ½å¯ä»¥çœ‹ä½œæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ¬¡çº§æ‰°åŠ¨ä¸­å¿ƒï¼Œå®ƒä»¬èƒ½äº§ç”Ÿçƒé¢å­æ³¢ã€‚åä¸€æ—¶åˆ»çš„æ³¢å‰çš„ä½ç½®æ˜¯æ‰€æœ‰è¿™äº›å­æ³¢å‰çš„åŒ…ç»œé¢

ç›¸å¹²å åŠ ï¼š Pç‚¹çš„æŒ¯åŠ¨æ˜¯æ¬¡æ³¢å¯¹Pç‚¹çš„ç›¸å¹²å åŠ çš„ç»“æœï¼Œæ³¢å‰$\Sigma$ ä¸Šä»»ä¸€ç‚¹çš„å¤æŒ¯å¹…ï¼š$E_Q=A\frac{exp(ikR)}{R}$ ï¼ŒQå¤„å°é¢å…ƒ$d\sigma$ å‘å‡ºçš„å­æ³¢ï¼š$K(\theta)CE_Q d\sigma \frac{exp(ikRr)}{r}$

åˆ™$P$ç‚¹çš„å¤æŒ¯å¹…ï¼š $$ E(P)=\iint\limits_{\Sigma’}CK(\theta)E_Q\frac{exp(ikr)}{r}d\sigma\=CE_Q\iint\limits_{\Sigma’}K(\theta)\frac{exp(ikr)}{r}d\sigma $$ æƒ æ›´æ–¯-è²æ¶…å°”åŸç†ï¼š

  1. æ³¢ä¼ åˆ°çš„ä»»æ„ç‚¹éƒ½æ˜¯æ¬¡æ³¢çš„ä¸­å¿ƒ
  2. åŒ…å›´å…‰æºçš„ä»»ä¸€æ³¢å‰ä¸Šå„æ¬¡æ³¢åœ¨ç©ºé—´å„ç‚¹è¿›è¡Œç›¸å¹²å åŠ 

åŸºå°”éœå¤«è¡å°„ç§¯åˆ†å…¬å¼

$$ E(P)=\frac{1}{i\lambda} \iint\limits_\Sigma \frac{Aexp(ikl)}{l}\frac{exp(ikr)}{r}\frac{\cos \alpha_1+\cos \alpha_2}{2}d\sigma $$

è¿‘ä¼¼-1ï¼š å…‰æºç¦»å¼€å­”è¶³å¤Ÿè¿œ $\to$ å…¥å°„å…‰è§†ä¸ºå‚ç›´å…¥å°„ $\to\ \cos \alpha_1=1,\cos \alpha_2=\cos \theta \to\ K(\theta)=\frac{1+\cos \theta}{2}$

  • $\theta=0,K(\theta)=1 \to\ æ³¢é¢æ³•çº¿æ³•çº¿æ–¹å‘ä¸Šå­æ³¢çš„æŒ¯å¹…æœ€å¤§$
  • $\theta=\pi,K(\theta)=0\to\ è¯æ˜è²æ¶…å°”å…³äº\theta=\frac{\pi}{2}æ—¶K(\theta)=0çš„ç»“è®ºæ—¶é”™è¯¯çš„$

è¿‘ä¼¼-2ï¼š

  • å®é™…ä¸­ï¼Œè¡å°„å­”çº¿åº¦ $\ll$ å…‰æºã€è§‚å¯Ÿå±åˆ°è¡å°„å±è·ç¦»$\to \theta\ å˜åŒ–å¾ˆå°\to K(\theta)å¯æå‡ºç§¯åˆ†å¤–ï¼Œå–K(\theta)=1$
  • å®é™…ä¸­ï¼Œ$r$ çš„å˜åŒ–ä¸å¤§ï¼Œçº¦å–$\frac{1}{r}\approx\frac{1}{z_1}$

å¾—ç®€åŒ–çš„åŸºå°”éœå¤«å…¬å¼ï¼š $$ \tilde{E}(P)=\frac{1}{i\lambda z_1}\iint\limits_\Sigma\tilde{E}(Q)exp(ikr)d\sigma $$ è¿‘ä¼¼-3ï¼š å¯¹ $r=z_1[1+(\frac{x-x_1}{z_1})^2+(\frac{y-y_1}{z_1})^2]$ ä½œäºŒé¡¹å±•å¼€ï¼Œå› ä¸º $z_1\gg x,y,x_1,y_1$ï¼Œæœ‰åªå–å±•å¼€åçš„å‰ä¸¤é¡¹ $$ r=z_1{1+\frac{1}{2}[\frac{(x-x_1)^2+(y-y_1)^2}{z^2_1}]}\to\ è²æ¶…å°”è¿‘ä¼¼ $$

å•ç¼å¤«ç…ç¦¾è´¹è¡å°„

å…‰å¼ºï¼š $I(P)=\frac{\sin^2 \alpha}{\alpha^2}=I_0\sin c^2\alpha$ ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­$\alpha=\frac{\pi}{\lambda}a\sin\theta$

æŒ¯å¹…çŸ¢é‡æ³•ï¼š

  • æš—çº¹ï¼š$\frac{\pi a}{\lambda}\sin\theta=k\pi$
  • æ˜çº¹ä¸­å¿ƒï¼š$\tan\alpha=\alpha$

è²æ¶…å°”åŠæ³¢å¸¦æ³•ï¼š $$ \delta=a\sin \theta=k\frac{\lambda}{2}, \quad \left{\begin{matrix} k=2n-1, \quad n=1,2,3\dots \quad äº®çº¹\ k=2n,\quad n=1,2,3\dots \quad æš—çº¹ \end{matrix}\right. $$ æ¡çº¹è§’å®½åº¦ï¼š

  1. ä¸­å¤®æ˜çº¹åŠè§’å®½åº¦ï¼š$\frac{\lambda}{a}$
  2. å…¶ä»–æ˜çº¹ï¼š$\Delta\theta_k=\theta_{æš—k+1}-\theta_{æš—k}\approx\frac{\lambda}{a}$

å››ã€åœ†å­”ã€åœ†ç¯å’Œå¤šè¾¹å½¢å­”çš„å¤«ç…ç¦¾è´¹è¡å°„

åœ†å­”å¤«ç…ç¦¾è´¹è¡å°„

å…‰å¼ºï¼š $I_p=I_0[\frac{2J_1(\psi)}{\psi}]^2 \quad\to\ J_1(\psi):ä¸€çº§è´å¡å°”å‡½æ•°$

â€‹ $J_1(\psi)çš„çº§æ•°å±•å¼€\quad J_1(\psi)=\frac{\psi}{2}-\frac{\psi^2}{2^2\cdot4}+\frac{\psi^3}{2^2\cdot4^2\cdot6}-\dots$

â€‹ ç¬¬ä¸€çº§ï¼š$\sin \theta=1.22\frac{\lambda}{D}$

åœ†ç¯çš„å¤«ç…ç¦¾è´¹è¡å°„

$\varepsilon=\frac{R_1}{R_2}$ æ¥æ”¶å±ä¸ŠPç‚¹çš„å…‰å¼ºï¼š $$ I(P)=\frac{I_0}{(1-\varepsilon^2)^2}[\frac{2J_1(\psi_2)}{\psi_2}-\varepsilon^2\frac{2J_1(\psi_1)}{\psi_1}]^2 $$ ç‰¹ç‚¹ï¼š ä¸­å¤®ä¸ºäº®æ–‘ï¼Œå‘¨å›´æ˜¯æ˜æš—ç›¸é—´çš„åœ†ç¯ï¼›$\varepsilon$ è¶Šå¤§ï¼Œä¸­å¤®äº®æ–‘è¶Šå°ï¼Œæ¡çº¹å‘ä¸­å¿ƒæ”¶ç¼©

äº”ã€æˆåƒä»ªå™¨åƒåˆ†è¾¨æœ¬é¢†

ç‘åˆ©åˆ¤æ®ï¼š ç‚¹ç‰©$S_1$çš„è‰¾é‡Œæ–‘ä¸­å¿ƒæ°å¥½ä¸å¦ä¸€ä¸ªç‚¹ç‰©$S_2$çš„è‰¾é‡Œæ–‘è¾¹ç¼˜ï¼ˆç¬¬ä¸€è¡å°„æå°ï¼‰ç›¸é‡åˆæ—¶ï¼Œæ°å¥½åˆ†è¾¨ä¸¤ç‰©ç‚¹ã€‚

æœ€å°åˆ†è¾¨è§’ï¼š $\delta\varphi=1.22\lambda/D$

å…­ã€è¡å°„å…‰æ …

åˆ†ç±»

  1. ç»“æ„
    • ä¸€ç»´å…‰æ …ï¼šå¹³æ¿ç­‰è·åˆ’ç—•
    • äºŒç»´
    • ä¸‰ç»´
  2. ææ–™
    • æŒ¯å¹…å‹
    • ä½ç›¸å‹
  3. åŠŸèƒ½
    • é€å°„å¼
    • åå°„å¼

å…‰æ …è¡å°„

å…‰æ …å¸¸æ•°ï¼š $d=a+b\quad a:é€å…‰,b:ä¸é€å…‰$ $d=\frac{1}{N}$

ç¼é—´å¹²æ¶‰å› å­

å¤šæŒ¯å¹…å¹²æ¶‰ï¼š åˆæŒ¯å¹… $A=A_0\frac{\sin \frac{N\varphi}{2}}{\sin\frac{\varphi}{2}}$

  • ä¸»æå¤§ï¼š$d\sin\theta=k\lambda, \quad k=0, \pm 1, \pm 2, \dots$
  • æš—çº¹ï¼š$d\sin \theta=\frac{k’}{N}\lambda ,\ k’ä¸ºæ•´æ•°ä¸”\neq 0,\pm N, \pm 2N, \dots$

â€‹ ç›¸é‚»ä¸»æå¤§ä¹‹é—´æœ‰ N-1ä¸ªæš—çº¹ï¼ŒN-2ä¸ªæ¬¡æå¤§

ç¼ºçº§ç°è±¡ï¼š $k=\pm \frac{d}{a}k’, å…¶ä¸­k’ä¸ºè¡å°„çº§æ¬¡$

å…‰æ …è¡å°„å…‰å¼ºå…¬å¼

$$ I_P=I_0(\frac{\sin u}{u})^2\cdot(\frac{\sin N\beta}{\sin \beta})^2\ u=\frac{\pi a\sin \theta}{\lambda},\quad \beta=\frac{\varphi}{2}=\frac{\pi d\sin\theta}{\lambda} $$

è°±çº¿çš„åŠè§’å®½åº¦

$$ \Delta\theta=\frac{\lambda}{Nd\cos\theta_K} $$

å€¾æ–œå…¥å°„æ—¶çš„å…‰æ …æ–¹ç¨‹

$$ d(\sin i\pm\sin\theta)=m\lambda $$

å…‰è°±è‰²æ•£

$$ D=\frac{\delta\theta}{\delta\lambda}\ D=\frac{K}{d\cos\theta}\to D_l=\frac{Kf’}{d\cos\theta}( çº¿è‰²æ•£æœ¬é¢† )\ è‰²åˆ†è¾¨æœ¬é¢†:R\equiv\frac{\lambda}{\Delta\lambda}=kN $$

æ£±é•œ

è‰²æ•£æœ¬é¢†ï¼šåœ¨æœ€å°åå‘è§’æ—¶ $$ D=\frac{d\delta_m}{d\lambda}=(\frac{dn}{d\delta_m})^{-1}\frac{dn}{d\lambda},\quad\frac{dn}{d\lambda}\toæ£±é•œææ–™çš„è‰²æ•£ç‡\ è‰²æ•£æœ¬é¢†:D\frac{2\sin\frac{\alpha}{2}}{\sqrt{1-n^2\sin^2 \frac{\alpha}{2}}}\cdot\frac{dn}{d\lambda}\ çº¿è‰²æ•£:D_l=\frac{dl}{d\lambda}=Df’=\frac{2f’\sin\frac{\alpha}{2}}{\sqrt{1-n^2\sin^2\frac{\alpha}{2}}}\cdot\frac{dn}{d\lambda} $$ è‰²åˆ†è¾¨æœ¬é¢†ï¼š $$ R=t\cdot\frac{dn}{d\lambda} $$

è²æ¶…å°”è¡å°„

è²æ¶…å°”åŠæ³¢å¸¦æ³•

å„åŠæ³¢å¸¦åœ¨Pç‚¹çš„$\alpha_i$ç›¸é‚»å¸¦åœ¨Pdç‚¹äº§ç”Ÿçš„æŒ¯åŠ¨ä½ç›¸ç›¸åï¼ŒåˆæŒ¯åŠ¨å–å†³äºï¼šæ³¢å¸¦é¢ç§¯ã€è·ç¦»ã€å€¾æ–œå› å­

å°åœ†å­”è¡å°„

éœ²å‡ºåŠæ³¢å¸¦æ•° $$ n=\frac{\rho^2(R+r_0)}{Rr_0\lambda} $$

$$ a\sin\theta_x=n\lambda\quad\to\quad\text{Dark}\ \tan\alpha=\alpha\quad\to\quad\text{Light(Page 168)} $$

$$ \frac{I}{I_0}=\left [\frac{2J_1(Z)}{Z} \right ]^2\ J_1(Z)=0\to\text{Dark},\quad\frac{d}{dZ}\frac{J_1(Z)}{Z}=0\to\text{Light}\quad\text{(Page 172)} $$

item.title: è¯¾ç¨‹ç¬”è®°ï¼šç†è®ºåŠ›å­¦çŸ¥è¯†ç‚¹æ€»ç»“
item.description:
ã€Šç†è®ºåŠ›å­¦ã€‹è¯¾ç¨‹å­¦æœŸæœŸé—´å­¦ä¹ ç¬”è®°ï¼ˆæœŸæœ«æ€»ç»“ï¼‰

å¾®æŒ¯åŠ¨

å‹’è¥„-ç‹„é‡Œèµ«é‡Œå®šç†ï¼š $$ \frac{dV\frac{dV}{dq}=0\frac{dV}{dq}=0}{dq}=0,\frac{d^2V}{dq^2}>0\ \frac{dV}{dq_1}=\frac{dV}{dq_2}=0\ \left{\begin{matrix} &\left(\frac{\partial^2 V}{\partial q_1\partial q_2}\right)^2- \frac{\partial^2 V}{\partial q_1^2}\frac{\partial^2 V}{\partial q_1^2} <0\ &\frac{\partial^2 V}{\partial q_1^2}>0,\frac{\partial^2 V}{\partial q_2^2}>0 \

\end{matrix}\right. $$ **çº¿æ€§æŒ¯åŠ¨ï¼š**åŠ›å­¦ä½“ç³»åœ¨å¹³è¡¡ä½ç½®é™„è¿‘ä½œå¾®æŒ¯åŠ¨

ä¸¤ä¸ªè‡ªç”±åº¦ä¿å®ˆä½“ç³»çš„è‡ªç”±æŒ¯åŠ¨

åŠ¨èƒ½ï¼š$T=\frac{1}{2}\sum\limits^2_{i,j=1}A_{ij}\dot{x}_i\dot{x}j=\frac{1}{2}\left(A{11}\dot{x}1^2+2A{12}\dot{x}_1\dot{x}2+A{22}\dot{x}^2_2\right)$

é›¶ç‚¹å±•å¼€

åŠ¿èƒ½ï¼š $V(x_1,x_2)=\frac{1}{2}\sum\limits^2_{i,j=1}\left(\frac{\partial V^2}{\partial x_i\partial x_j}\right)0x_ix_j=\frac{1}{2}(b{11}x_1^2+2b_{12}x_1x_2+b_{22}x_2^2)$

åŠ¨èƒ½ï¼š $T=\frac{1}{2}\left(a_{11}\dot{x}1^2+2a{12}\dot{x}_1\dot{x}2+a{22}\dot{x}^2_2\right)$

å¾—ï¼š $$ \sum\limits_{j=1}^2(a_{ij}\ddot{x}j+b{ij}x_j)=0,\quad i=1,2\ \text{è¯•å–è§£ï¼š} \left{\begin{matrix} &x_1=A_1\sin(\omega t+\alpha)\ &x_2=A_2\sin(\omega t+\alpha) \end{matrix}\right. $$ é¢‘ç‡æ–¹ç¨‹ï¼š $(b_{11}-a_{11}\omega^2)(b_{22}-a_{22}\omega^2)-(b_{12}-a_{12}\omega^2)^2=0$

$a_{11},a_{22},b_{11},b_{22}>0,\quad a_{11}a_{22}>a_{12},b_{11}b_{22}>b_{12}$

å“ˆå¯†é¡¿

å‹’è®©å¾·å˜æ¢

æ–°çš„å‡½æ•°ç­‰äºä¸è¦çš„å˜é‡ä¹˜ä»¥åŸæ¥çš„å‡½æ•°å¯¹è¯¥å˜é‡çš„åå¾®å•†å†å‡å»åŸæ¥çš„å‡½æ•°ã€‚ $$ f=f(x,y),\quad df=udx+vdy\quad u=\frac{\partial f}{\partial x},v=\frac{\partial f}{\partial y}\ \bar{f}(u,y)=f[x(u,y),y]\

\left.\begin{matrix} &\frac{\partial\bar{f}}{\partial y}=v+u\frac{\partial x}{\partial y}\ &\frac{\partial \bar{f}}{\partial u}=u\frac{\partial x}{\partial u} \end{matrix}\right}\

\left.\begin{matrix} &v=-\frac{\partial }{\partial y}(-\bar{f}+ux)=-\frac{\partial g}{\partial y}\ &x=-\frac{\partial }{\partial u}(-\bar{f}+ux)=-\frac{\partial g}{\partial y} \end{matrix}\right} $$

æ­£åˆ™æ–¹ç¨‹

$\dot{q}\alpha\to p\alpha\Rightarrow H(p,q,t)=-L+\sum p_\alpha\dot{q}\alpha\Rightarrow dH=\sum (-\dot{p}\alpha dq_\alpha+p_\alpha d\dot{q}_\alpha)+\frac{\partial L}{\partial t}dt$

H is the function of the $q,p,t\to\quad \dot{q}\alpha=\frac{\partial H}{\partial p\alpha}\quad \dot{p}\alpha=-\frac{\partial H}{\partial q\alpha},\quad \frac{\partial H}{\partial t}=-\frac{\partial L}{\partial t}$

èƒ½é‡ç§¯åˆ†å’Œå¾ªç¯ç§¯åˆ†

Hä¸æ˜¾å«tï¼Œ$H=T+V$

æ±‚è§£æ–¹æ³•

  1. åˆ—å‡ºæ‹‰æ ¼æœ—æ—¥å‡½æ•°
  2. åˆ—å‡º$p_\alpha$ ï¼Œ$H$
  3. æ±‚å‡º $\dot{p}\alpha$ ï¼Œ $\dot{q}\alpha$

æ³Šæ¾æ‹¬å·

$\left[\varphi,H\right]=\sum\limits_{\alpha =1}^s \left( \frac{\partial\varphi}{\partial q_\alpha} \frac{\partial H}{\partial p_\alpha} - \frac{\partial\varphi}{\partial p_\alpha} \frac{\partial H}{\partial q_\alpha} \right)$ $\left.\begin{matrix}&\dot{p}\alpha=\left[p\alpha,H\right]\ &\dot{q}\alpha=\left[q\alpha,H\right] \end{matrix}\right}\quad(\alpha =1,2,3,\dots,s)$

æ³Šæ¾æ‹¬å·çš„ç‰¹æ€§

  1. $\left[c,\psi\right]=0$
  2. $\left[\varphi,\psi\right]+\left[\psi,\varphi\right]=0$
  3. $\left[\varphi,\psi\right]=\sum\limits^n_{j=1}\left[\varphi,\psi_j\right]$
  4. $\left[-\varphi,\psi\right]=-\left[\varphi,\psi\right]$
  5. $\frac{\partial}{\partial t}\left[\varphi,\psi\right]=\left[\frac{\partial\varphi}{\partial t},\psi\right]+\left[\varphi,\frac{\partial\varphi}{\partial t}\right]$
  6. $\left[\theta,\left[\varphi,\psi\right]\right]+\left[\varphi,\left[\psi,\theta\right]\right]+\left[\psi,\left[\theta,\varphi\right]\right]$
  7. $\left[q_\alpha,p_\beta\right]=\delta_{\alpha\beta}=\left{\begin{matrix}&1\quad(\alpha=\beta)\&0\quad(\alpha\neq\beta)\end{matrix}\right.$

ç¬¬å››ç«  åˆšä½“ 100

ç¬¬äº”ç«  éæƒ¯æ€§å‚è€ƒç³» 150

ç¬¬å…­ç«  å¤šè‡ªç”±åº¦ä½“ç³»çš„å¾®æŒ¯åŠ¨ 172

item.title: è¯¾ç¨‹ç¬”è®°ï¼šç”µåŠ¨åŠ›å­¦çŸ¥è¯†ç‚¹æ€»ç»“
item.description:
ã€Šç”µåŠ¨åŠ›å­¦ã€‹è¯¾ç¨‹å­¦æœŸæœŸé—´å­¦ä¹ ç¬”è®°ï¼ˆæœŸæœ«æ€»ç»“ï¼‰

æ•°å­¦éƒ¨åˆ†

å®šä¹‰ï¼š

  • æ¢¯åº¦ï¼šæ–¹å‘å¯¼æ•°çš„æœ€å¤§å€¼ $(grad\varphi)_l=\frac{d\varphi}{dl}$
  • æ•£åº¦ï¼š$div\vec{f}=\lim\limits_{\Delta V\to0}\frac{\oint\vec{f}\cdot d\vec{S}}{\Delta V}$
  • æ—‹åº¦ï¼š$rot\vec{f}=\lim\limits_{\Delta S\to0}\frac{\oint\vec{f}\cdot d\vec{l}}{\Delta S}\vec{n}$

æŸ±åæ ‡ç³»ï¼š

  • $\nabla$ :$\nabla=\vec{e_r}\frac{\partial}{\partial r}+\vec{e_\theta}\frac{1}{r}\frac{\partial}{\partial\theta}+\vec{e_z}\frac{\partial}{\partial z}$

  • æ•£åº¦:$\nabla\cdot\vec{A}=\frac{\partial A_r}{\partial r}+\frac{A_r}{r}+\frac{1}{r}\frac{\partial A_\theta}{\partial\theta}+\frac{\partial A_z}{\partial z}$

çƒåæ ‡ï¼š

  • $\nabla$ : $\vec{e_r}\frac{\partial}{\partial r}+\vec{e_\theta}\frac{1}{r}\frac{\partial}{\partial\theta}+\vec{e_\phi}\frac{1}{r\sin\theta}\frac{\partial}{\partial\varphi}$

å…¬å¼ï¼š

  • å¤åˆå‡½æ•°
    • $\nabla f(u)=\frac{df}{du}\nabla u$
    • $\nabla\cdot\vec{A}(u)=\frac{d\vec{A}}{du}\cdot\nabla u$
    • $\nabla\times\vec{A}(u)=\nabla u\times\frac{d\vec{A}}{du}$
  • å¸¸ç”¨å…¬å¼
    • $\nabla(\varphi\psi)=(\nabla\varphi)\psi+\varphi\nabla\psi$
    • $\nabla\cdot(\varphi\vec{A})=\nabla\varphi\cdot\vec{A}+\varphi\nabla\cdot\vec{A}$
    • $\nabla\times(\varphi\vec{A})=\nabla\varphi\times\vec{A}=\varphi\nabla\times\vec{A}$
    • $\nabla\cdot(\vec{A}\times\vec{B})=\vec{B}\cdot(\nabla\times\vec{A})-\vec{A}\cdot(\nabla\times\vec{B})$
    • $\nabla\times(\vec{A}\times\vec{B})=(\vec{B}\cdot\nabla)\vec{A}+(\nabla\cdot\vec{B})\vec{A}-(\nabla\cdot\vec{A})\vec{B}-(\vec{A}\cdot\nabla)\vec{B}$
    • $\nabla(\vec{A}\cdot\vec{B})=\vec{A}\times(\nabla\times\vec{B})+\vec{B}\times(\nabla\times\vec{A})+(\vec{A}\cdot\nabla)\vec{B}+(\vec{B}\cdot\nabla)\vec{A}$
    • $\nabla\cdot\nabla\varphi\equiv\nabla^2\varphi$
    • $\nabla\times(\nabla\times\vec{A})=\nabla(\nabla\cdot\vec{A})-\nabla^2\vec{A}$
  • é«˜æ–¯å…¬å¼å’Œæ–¯æ‰˜å…‹æ–¯å…¬å¼ï¼š$\oint_S\vec{f}\vdot d\vec{S}=\int_V\nabla\cdot\vec{f}dV$, $\oint_L\vec{f}\cdot d\vec{l}=\int_S(\nabla\times\vec{f})\cdot d\vec{S}$

ä¸€äº›å€¼ï¼š $\nabla r=\frac{\vec{r}}{r}$ , $\nabla\vec{r}=3$, $\nabla\cdot\frac{\vec{r}}{r^3}=\nabla\times\frac{\vec{r}}{r^3}=0$

ç¬¬ä¸€ç« 

ç”µè·å®ˆæ’å®šå¾‹ï¼š$\nabla\cdot\vec{J}+\frac{\partial\rho}{\partial t}=0$, $I=\int_S\vec{J}\cdot d\vec{S}$, $\vec{J}=\sum\limits_i\rho_i\vec{v}_i$

Python ä¸­ä¸€ä¸ªè‘—åçš„è¯­æ³•ç³–å°±æ˜¯è£…é¥°å™¨ã€‚è£…é¥°å™¨æ˜¯ä¸€ç§é—­åŒ…ï¼ˆå³å‡½æ•°åµŒå¥—å‡½æ•°ï¼‰ï¼Œå…¶ä½œç”¨åœ¨äºæ‹“å®½åŸå‡½æ•°çš„åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åœ¨ä¸å¯¹åŸå‡½æ•°ä½œä»»ä½•ä¿®æ”¹çš„æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼Œæ‹“å®½å‡½æ•°çš„åŠŸèƒ½ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶æœ‰æ•ˆé¿å…é‡å¤ä»£ç ï¼Œå¢åŠ äº†ä»£ç çš„å¯è¯»æ€§ã€‚

ä¸‹é¢ä»¥é™¤æ³•ä½œç®€å•ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼Œåœ¨é™¤æ³•ä¸­é™¤æ•°ä¸èƒ½ä¸ºé›¶ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥åœ¨ä¸¤æ•°ç›¸é™¤å‰åº”å½“æ£€æŸ¥é™¤æ•°æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºé›¶ï¼š

  1. åªä½¿ç”¨å‡½æ•°
def check(b):
   if b == 0ï¼›
       return False
   else:
       return True

def division(a, b):
   if check(b):
       return a/b
   else:
       print("Divisor cannot be zero!")
  1. è£…é¥°å™¨ç”¨æ³•
def check(func):
   def wrapper(*args, **kwargs):
      if args[1] == 0
         print("Divisor cannot be zero!")
         return None
      else:
         return func(*args, **kwargs)
   return wrapper


@check
def division(a, b):
   return a/b
